reference.shortdesc: The bookchangehistory element contains information about the history of the book's creation and publishing lifecycle, including who wrote, reviewed, edited, and tested the book. It also specifies when these events took place.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <bookmeta> <bookchangehistory> <reviewed> <started><year>2007</year><month>10</month></started> <completed><year>2008</year><month>01</month></completed> </reviewed> <edited> <person>Joe T. Editor</person> <completed><year>2008</year><month>03</month><day>15</day></completed> </edited> <tested> <organization>OASIS</organization> <completed><year>2008</year><month>04</month></completed> </tested> <approved> <organization>OASIS</organization> <completed><year>2008</year><month>05</month></completed> </approved> <bookevent> <bookeventtype name="Type of Major Event"/> <completed><year>2009</year></completed> </bookevent> </bookchangehistory> </bookmeta>
